title: NearTrees
description: NearTrees is a deflationary collection of 2555 eco-friendly NFTs planted on the NEAR ecosystem with the goal of implementation in the metaverse, bringing value to society through various charities decided together with DAO members.

allSold.title: All INITIAL_COUNT minted!

extraSections.text:
# Introducing NearTrees

The elemental trees were born long before any other living creature, and they will likely still be here long after everything else is gone. Their ancient roots are entrenched in the Earth's soil, running all the way down to our planet's very core. Their trunks are among the most indestructible materials known to man. And their leaves are capable of emitting enough oxygen to sustain an entire country for a year.

Our 2,555 hand-drawn NFT portraits will be published on the NEAR blockchain and have been designed with eco-friendly aims in mind. However, in order for these elemental NFTrees to emerge, we must first release our 333 minted 'seeds' which will have many benefits for the early adopters as they harness the powers of the five elements. The decision is yours‚Ä¶ earth, wind, fire, water, or lightning. Each piece is a unique non-fungible token (NFT) and contains unique features and characteristics. It was our aim with this project to not only make a positive difference to the environment with the collection, but also provide incredible artwork and worthwhile features. So, what are you waiting for? Come and harness the powers of the elemental trees today!

# FAQ

### Why NEAR?

It's super quick, reliable, secure, easy to use and there are effectively no gas fees. OH, it's also carbon-neutral. üçÉ

### How to mint?

Couple of steps:

1. Get a NEAR wallet if you don't have one. You can easily claim one [HERE](https://wallet.near.org/) (Need a manual? Here's the [LINK](https://near.org/blog/getting-started-with-the-near-wallet/))

2. Fund your wallet. We prefer [MOONPAY](https://www.moonpay.com/) for quick and easy NEAR purchase using Visa or Mastercard.

   You can also use any other exchanges you like: Binance, Crypto.com, OKX, Gate.io, Huobi Global.

3. Withdraw NEAR to the wallet you just created

4. MINT! When NearTrees minting is live, simply connect your NEAR wallet to the website using the Mint button.

### Wen mint for the free Seed?

May 20th / Check Discord for time & more info.

### WHAT? Is the Seed FREE?

Yes, you mint it FREE üëÄ, then transfer it to the team and get your OG role. / Check Discord for specific instructions and more info.

### What about the main NearTrees collection?

NearTrees is a deflationary collection of 2555 eco-friendly NFTs planted on the NEAR ecosystem with the goal of implementation in the metaverse and by bringing value to the society through various charities decided together with DAO members.

### How many Whitelist and OG spots will be available for the NearTrees collection?

‚òùÔ∏è 800 WL spots (Max of 1 NFT Per Wallet)

‚úåÔ∏è 333 OG roles (Max of 2 NFTs per wallet)

### What will be the price?

ü§ù PUBLIC MINT - 5 NEAR

üëç WHITELIST MINT - 4.5 NEAR

ü§ô OG MINT - 4 NEAR

PUBLIC MINT - TBA

If you are fast enough‚Ä¶you can try!
